definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ezr 6:3 foundation (prob. loan-word fr. As. uššû, id., √ [[אשׁשׁ]] (v. BH), so Zim:KAT 3. 649; Targum f. [[אוּשָׁא]], NH [[אוּשָׁה]], Chr-Pal. 0w4, 0w40, Schulth:Lex. 19; Ar. 0’us=un: Nö:M 99);—pl. emph. [[אֻשַּׁיָּא]] Ezr 4:12, Ezr 5:16; sf. [[אֻשּׁׁהִי]] Ezr 6:3.
